title: Copying/Selecting Text is a joke
text: You ever want to just highlight a word to look up its definition or something well you can‚Äôt. You can‚Äôt just select a word to highlight it first you have to click the text box, then you‚Äôve got to select ‚Äúselect text‚Äù from the options. Then the entire box is highlighted so you have to scroll all the way to either edge and carefully move the cursor from the selected text to give you a blank space to click to unselect. Then you‚Äôve go to scroll to where you need to and select the text from there. I‚Äôd never imagine someone would think to reinvent text selection to be so user antagonistic. Good luck if you want to select multiple chat boxes all it once. It‚Äôs such a hassle to copy each text box one by one you‚Äôre better off taking the time to find your laptop and try it through the browsers UI which‚Äôll save you from this insane UI. The smartest piece of software out there struggling with simple text select
